titles.title: A bill to improve wildfire management operations and the safety of firefighters and communities with the best available technology.
Wildfire Management Technology Advancement Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 712.

action.text: By Senator Murkowski from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 115-441.
